name: Pycudd
tagline: Python SWIG bindings to the CUDD BDD package
body:
### Welcome to Pycudd!
These are the simple instructions for the setting up Pycudd.
They assume you just created a Google Cloud Service VM configured as 64-Bit Ubuntu 14.04 

SIMPLIFIED INSTALLATION DIRECTIONS FOR PYCUDD
----------------------------------

INSTALLATION:
1. install necessary packages
'''
sudo apt-get install git
sudo apt-get install make
sudo apt-get install gcc
sudo apt-get install swig
sudo apt-get install g++
sudo apt-get install python-dev
'''

2. Clone the GIT repo
'''
git clone https://github.com/kariefury/pycudd.git
'''

3. Build the project
'''
cd ~
cd pycudd/cudd-2.4.2/
make
cd ~
cd pycudd/pycudd
make depend
make
'''

4. Edit environment variable PYTHONPATH to include pycudd directory 
'''
export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:pycudd/
'''
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
